package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"html/template"
	"net/http"
)

var templates = template.Must(template.New("page").Parse(`<h1>{{.Missing}}</h1>`))

type Page struct {
	Title string
}

func handle(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
	_ = templates.ExecuteTemplate(w, "page", Page{Title: "Home"})
}

var _ = fmt.Sprint
